PackageOracle.name: DA_OFFERING_PRODUCT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_OFFERING_PRODUCT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.02.588462000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_offering_product;

body.name: DA_OFFERING_PRODUCT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_OFFERING_PRODUCT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.02.598301000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_offering_product.add, parms=' || offering_id || '|' || product_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_offering_product a
(
a.offering_id
,a.product_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.offering_id
,add.product_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_offering_product.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,offering_id IN NUMBER
,product_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_offering_product.del, parms=' || offering_id || '|' || product_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_offering_product a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.offering_id = del.offering_id
AND a.product_id = del.product_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_offering_product.del');

END del;

END da_offering_product;
